about_the_game:
This demo only has the first dungeon of the game along with a part of the second optional dungeon aka the only stuff required in the main story for it.

You were a simple detective, but after a weird dream, you got a contract for one million dollars to find info on the Daemon-Lance corporation. After things went south, you were left for dead to come back as an Aswang. With your new demonic powers, you must solve the case and undercover the mystery!

Uncover the mystery by uncovering clues!
Talk to other demons, friend or foe, for secrets and info for your cause!
Recruit other demons to join your party!
Use the TP charge system to charge your attacks and the shield system to attack weaknesses to destroy all enemy defenses in this fast paced RPG!
Collect all the secret 72 tarot cards hidden around for a big secret!
Explore the 7 main dungeons for info about the case and fight big demons along the way!
Choose your actions carefully in the many side quests!
There are three main story routes each taking 10-15 hours each!

The path for the truth is clouded by mystery and danger, are you up to the task?
